Red Dragon, Very Young

A crown of cruel horns surrounds the head of this mighty dragon. Thick scales the color of molten rock cover its long body.



Very Young Red Dragon

CR 8

XP 4,800
CE Medium dragon (fire)
Init +5; Senses dragon senses, smoke vision; Perception +13
DEFENSE
AC 20, touch 11, flat-footed 19 (+1 Dex, +9 natural)
hp 85 (9d12+27)
Fort +9, Ref +7, Will +9
Immune fire, paralysis, sleep
Weaknesses Vulnerability to cold
OFFENSE
Spd 40 ft., fly 150 ft. (average)
Melee bite +14 (1d8+7), 2 claws +14 (1d6+5), 2 wings +9 (1d4+2)
Space 5 ft.; Reach 5 ft.
Special Attacks breath weapon (30-ft. cone, DC 17, 4d10 fire)
STATISTICS
Str 21, Dex 12, Con 17, Int 12, Wis 13, Cha 12
Base Atk +9; CMB +14; CMD 25 (29 vs. trip)
Feats Cleave, Improved Initiative, Iron Will, Power Attack, Vital Strike
Skills Appraise +13, Bluff +13, Fly +13, Intimidate +13, Perception +13, Sense Motive +13, Stealth +13
Languages Common, Draconic
ECOLOGY
Environment warm mountains
Organization solitary
Treasure triple
SPECIAL ABILITIES
Smoke Vision (Ex) A very young red dragon can see perfectly in smoky conditions (such as those created by pyrotechnics).


Few creatures are more cruel and fearsome than the mighty red dragon. King of the chromatics, this terrible beast brings ruin and death to the lands that fall under its shadow.
